Config.AnythingAnywhere.Title: Anything Anywhere
Config.AnythingAnywhere.Furniture.Title: Furniture
Config.AnythingAnywhere.Building.Title: Buildings
Config.AnythingAnywhere.GroundEnabled.De: If enabled, you can place ground furniture at any location.
Config.AnythingAnywhere.WallEnabled.Name: Wall Furniture
Config.AnythingAnywhere.WallEnabled.Desc: If enabled, you can place wall furniture at any location.
Config.AnythingAnywhere.MiniObiliskAnywh: If enabled, you can place the mini-obilisk at any location.
Config.AnythingAnywhere.UseJukeboxAnywhe: If enabled, you can use the jukebox anywhere.
If enabled, you can place wall furniture at any location inside the farm houses, for some reason.
Config.AnythingAnywhere.EnableBuilding.D: Enables the building features of this mod.
Config.AnythingAnywhere.BuildMenu.Name: Build Anywhere Menu
Config.AnythingAnywhere.BuildMenu.Descri: Opens up the build menu anywhere.
Opens up the build menu anywhere.
If enabled, you can build at any location, even in walls.
